Package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader

Class XmlStudentParser

java.lang.Object
edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.XmlHelper
edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.XmlStudentParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
EntityResolver, ErrorHandler
class XmlStudentParser
extends XmlHelper
This class parses XML data that describes a Student.
